meanings.sent1: The student's argument was unpersuasive to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Her unpersuasive speech failed to change anyone's mind.
meanings.sent3: The unpersuasive sales pitch left the customers uninterested.
meanings.sent4: His unpersuasive attempts to win her over fell flat.
meanings.sent5: The unpersuasive evidence presented in court did not sway the jury.

meanings.sent1: The unpersuasive advertisement did not attract many customers.
meanings.sent2: His unpersuasive excuses did not convince his boss.
meanings.sent3: The unpersuasive attempt at a joke left everyone silent.
meanings.sent4: Her unpersuasive leadership style did not inspire the team.
meanings.sent5: The unpersuasive campaign failed to gain support from the public.
